GK21brkas_pu:6: [This computer version of the Brhatkathaslokasamgraha of
GK21brkas_pu:7: Budhasvamin was created between 1997 and 2002. The input is
GK21brkas_pu:8: based on the text edited by Felix Lacote (Paris, 1908). It was
GK21brkas_pu:9: meant as a working input for myself at first,
GK21brkas_pu:12: who will find it useful. However you
GK21brkas_pu:13: should know that there are certain deviations from Lac%
GK21brkas_pu:14: text: Cases of printing mistakes in the edition were silently
GK21brkas_pu:15: corrected. In a few cases I also adopted a different reading, when
GK21brkas_pu:16: it seemed to make more sense. It is also an uncorrected version.
GK21brkas_pu:17: The input is based on the TZ-Format created by Peter Schreiner
GK21brkas_pu:18: and others, which marks sandhi and composita. Only personal
GK21brkas_pu:19: names are never marked as composita in this input.
GK21brkas_pu:1573: na hi bhartrā na ca sutair /
GK21brkas_pu:2067: [The explanation of Vasantakaś dream is missing] //5.71/
GK21brkas_pu:5294: ity adhyāsitacetasā katham api prakrāntayā cintayā /
GK21brkas_pu:5676: [The arrival of Gomukha and the beginning of Hariśikhaś speech is missing] //11.96/
GK21brkas_pu:5717: iti saśarīrayā kṣaṇam iva kṣaṇadāḥ kṣapayan /
GK21brkas_pu:6045: [The first half of the verse is missing] /
GK21brkas_pu:6052: taṃ cākarṇya mahāmanoratham idaṃ pūrṇaṃ cirāt kāṅkṣitaṃ /
GK21brkas_pu:6054: yācñāvṛttikadarthitair bahubhir apy āptair na hi prārthakāḥ /
GK21brkas_pu:6055: prītiṃ yānti tathā yathā tanubhir apy arthaiḥ sukhābhyāgataiḥ //12.84/
GK21brkas_pu:6208: mama tv āsīt kim ity eṣā /
GK21brkas_pu:6260: āsīn me manasi hṛtā na sā mṛtā sā /
GK21brkas_pu:6261: yā dṛṣṭer vrajati na gocaraṃ priyā me /
GK21brkas_pu:7130: tāṃ ca tvāṃ ca tatas tasya /
GK21brkas_pu:7767: rūpaṃ nirūpayitum eva mayā na śakyam //16.93/
GK21brkas_pu:8488: mandaṃ pādatalena tālam anayā yat kuṭṭayantyāciraṃ /
GK21brkas_pu:8489: gītaṃ mām abhi visphuratkuharitaṃ tāraiḥ subhugnabhruvā /
GK21brkas_pu:8490: tenaiva pratanūkṛtām apaharann asyāḥ krameṇa trapāṃ /
GK21brkas_pu:9381: yadā mahyaṃ na kaś ca na /
GK21brkas_pu:9548: bhoḥ sādho mā bhavat te bhīr /
GK21brkas_pu:9804: mūlyaṃ tasya ca yat tan nau /
GK21brkas_pu:10359: me me hā heti ca dhvaniḥ //18.467/
GK21brkas_pu:10657: ko 'yaṃ kā vā tvam ity atha /
GK21brkas_pu:10992: sā hi hi mām āhvayaty eva /
GK21brkas_pu:11300: [The final verse seems to be missing] //18.703/
GK21brkas_pu:11324: yo na strī na pumān iti //19.6/
GK21brkas_pu:12389: mama tv āsīn na mām eṣa /
GK21brkas_pu:12758: tat kim etat kathaṃ nv etad /
GK21brkas_pu:13157: ārāt sahyaṃ cetasā yan na soḍham //20.260/
GK21brkas_pu:14577: yūyaṃ ye vā yatas tyā vā /
GK21brkas_pu:15975: tvaṃ na dīrgho na ca hrasvas /
GK21brkas_pu:16369: [The second half of the verse is missing] //24.17/
GK21brkas_pu:16370: [The first half of the verse is missing] /
GK21brkas_pu:16539: hā hā kim idam ity uktvā /
GK21brkas_pu:17234: taiḥ sadyas tanutām anīyata sa me saṃkalpajanmā jvaraḥ /
GK21brkas_pu:17236: mandair apy udabindubhir navatarair ujjhanti saṃtaptatām //26.51/
GK21brkas_pu:17654: mā vākṣīr mā ca māṃ puṣaḥ /
GK21brkas_pu:17702: suprāpaṃ dharaṇīcarair yad aparaiḥ krodhādivaśyair api /
